title: Activity 1 copy updates (examples list, anonymity notice, submit button label)

requirements.summary: Update Activity 1 example words list in proposal content to the exact provided sequence and keep the Activity 1 page sourcing it from proposalContent.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Activity 1 page, the 'Examples:' line displays the updated list in the same order provided by the user.
The examples content is sourced consistently from the Activity 1 content (proposalContent.activities.activity1.examples) so it is not duplicated in multiple places.

file_operations.description: Replace proposalContent.activities.activity1.examples with exactly: "ethical, visionary, authentic, resilient, empathetic, principled, transformational, courageous, accountable, inclusive, decisive, adaptable, humble, inspiring, grounded." (including punctuation and order).
Ensure the Activity 1 page continues to render the examples line directly from proposalContent.activities.activity1.examples (no hardcoded/duplicated examples elsewhere).

requirements.summary: Add the exact anonymous-information notice text to the Activity 1 page near the community patterns context.
acceptanceCriteria: The anonymous-information notice appears on Activity 1 in a readable location near the community patterns context (e.g., near the prompt area and/or near the community patterns board section).
The notice text matches exactly (including capitalization) as provided by the user.

file_operations.description: Add the user-facing notice text exactly as: "Your information is anonymous the only information we see is what is on the top leadership word community patterns board" and place it in a readable location near the community patterns section (e.g., above the LeadershipWordPatternsSummary section and/or near the prompt area).

requirements.summary: Update the Activity 1 submit button label to the exact requested text when not submitting, keeping the submitting label unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When the submit button is enabled and not submitting, its label reads exactly: "Share Your leadership word For Feedback".
When submitting, the loading label "Submitting..." remains unchanged.

file_operations.description: Change the non-loading submit button label from "Share Your Leadership Word" to exactly "Share Your leadership word For Feedback" while leaving the pending state label "Submitting..." unchanged.
